newsitem.title: FRANCE: Half of French believe in extraterrestrials.
newsitem.headline: Half of French believe in extraterrestrials.

text.p: About half of the French people believe there is life on other planets but just one in 10 fears a war with another world, according to a public opinion poll made public on Saturday.
The SOFRES poll for the weekly Tele K7 magazine found that 48 percent of those surveyed believe in extra-terrestrials while 45 percent do not believe in them.
Asked what extra-terrestrials could bring to Earth, 33 percent responded wisdom and 28 percent said progress.
